author: 儲光羲
paragraphs: The red lotus and the blue bamboo are fresh at night, the soap cover and the orchid radius float in the green feast.
Dancing in a boat to Handan's song, playing the strings of a Lu girl under the moon.
In the green woods and the blue islands, we meet in secret.
I ask how many times the song is sung, when the moon sets at five o'clock.
In the morning I come to the pavilion of immortals to listen to the songs of the strings, and at night I enter the pavilion of flowers to see the yiro.
I pity the wind and the moon with my wine by the pond, and I pity the water lilies with my boat at the mouth of the river.
The shadows of the bamboo shade the rocky hills, the breeze of the lotus floats the dancing clothes.
The boat seeks the green water at midnight, the moon is hidden in the green forest, and the people have not yet returned.
The flower pool and bamboo island are near the grove, and the oar floats in the night stream.
It is difficult to enter the boat when the water is covered with water, and it is easy to lower the moon when the people are left singing and dancing.

title: Inscribing the Huayang Cave in Maoshan
author: 儲光羲
paragraphs: Clouds fly at the entrance of Huayang Cave, and the drizzling rain is soaked to the skin.
The jade xiao fills the altar of immortality, and it should be the return of the Mao brothers.

title: Sending Sun Shanren
author: 儲光羲
paragraphs: In February, a lonely boat returns to the new forest, and the water fills the river with flowers.
I ask the hidden gentleman of the old garden, who comes and goes from time to time to live among people.

title: A Response to the Sacred System of Climbing Mount Huichang
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Wise thoughts enter Xiyi, true travels reach Gutz. The jade royalty is far away, and the clouds are late in leaving the flowers.
Where springs and ravines are in the mind, when the sun is in harmony. The six dragons move smoothly, the four seas are in harmony.

title: A Letter to Judge Yuan and Kunji in the Snow in the Province
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Ten thousand dots of snow in the dried scallops, flying in front of the brocade tent. The branches of the pearl should be more pure than the crane's hair.
The shadows are scattered into flowers and the moon, and the light penetrates the smoke of bamboo. Today, the Xie family is flourishing, and the song of Ying is heard in several places.

title: Sitting Alone in the Mountain Studio, I was delighted by the evening arrival of Lord Xuan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The path of the Tiger Stream is left untouched, and the smoke opens into the night. The moon and the monks come.
My heart is filled with red lotus water, my words are forgotten in green tea cups. The dawn is better in the foreground, and the slanting Han wants to return to the west.

title: An Autumn Evening with Zhang and Wei
author: 錢起
paragraphs: On a cool night, the curtains are well-lit, and light clouds pass over the early moon. The blue sky and the river are light, and the red leaves are dewy.
It is difficult to ask questions of the sky, and it is easy to forget the world. I do not know how the two phoenixes are perched.

title: A Visit to the Neighbouring Hermit on the Road to the Old Mountain
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Shaking hands on the road to Yunqi, weeping with hatred. Who knows that a thief in the green forest has long occupied the colored peaks?
My heart is dead in the pond, my voice is sad in the pines of the stone path. The moon and the moon are not the reason for the meeting of the gin and wine.

title: A visit to the East by Liu Gaijuan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am not drunk with a hundred flowers and wine, but I am sad to return. I have collected the jade of He, and I am still picking old mountain vines.
The heart of the world is full, and the face of the world is scarce. I am worried about the colour of the grass.

title: A Study with Liu Qi
author: 錢起
paragraphs: It is quiet at night in a deep pavilion, and I am painstakingly studying in front of a yellow scroll. The clouds are left in the ink swamp, and the glowing shadows are near the Chinese compilation.
The dreaming birds are rich in clear algae, and the scriptures are still wonderful. Why should I worry about the phoenix in the Dan cave, or not drink from the Jade Pond Spring?

title: The Early Descent into Jiangning
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The drizzling rain is breaking in the twilight sky, and the cool blowing sails are light. The clouds are high in autumn, and the mountains and rivers are lonely.
The frosty apples stay in the Chu waters; the cold geese bid farewell to the city of Wu. There is a dream of returning to the night, and the sad ape is not singing at night.

title: A Visit to the Southern Tower of Fuxiu
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A lonely tree extends the spring sun, and other mountains roll in the dawn. The geese on the lake and the flowers by the sun.
My luggage has been lost for a long time, my return is on credit. Where can I send my yoyo?
The old man is separated by clouds.

title: Accompanying the officials on a boat ride on an unlucky day in Jiangling
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There are masters in the rivers and lakes. The boat ride is better, and the mountains are new for a long time.
The wine is peaceful and the flowers are exotic. There is no moon at night in the south of the city, and no guests should stay with long sleeves.

title: An Autumn Evening in the County
author: 錢起
paragraphs: It is an easy evening in the mountain town, and the sorrowful people cover their doors first. My salary is too low to sell wine, and my family is too poor to give me clothes.
The dew is heavy and the crocuses are falling, the moon is cold and the chickens are flying. I feel that I have no remedy for my clumsiness, and I mourn my return to the clouds.

title: Two Poems on the Autumn Night with Liang Qi Bing Cao
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A smile is unattainable, and we see each other only rarely. We often plucked the lozenge and drank wine, and waited for the moon before bibimbap.
The shadows of the stars are low, the sounds of insects are close to the clothes of travelers. It is late in the year when we live in humble abode, and we envy the geese flying south.
I wanted to abandon my path, but I met you again this evening. The old man is waiting for a drink, and the young boy is waiting for an essay.
Whose flute is under the moon, and how many clouds are at the top of the city. How can I leave the group again tomorrow?

title: 和萬年成少府寓直
author: 錢起
paragraphs: It is a new autumn night in Ch'ien, and the literati are thinking about it. The sound of the bell is from the immortal tucked away, and the moon is near the frosty platform.
A leaf and a glowing firefly, a lonely cloud with geese. When the purple book comes down tomorrow, I should ask Changqing about his talent.

title: A Spring Evening with Chang Sun Yi
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A good time is hard to come by again, a clear night in this cloudy forest. The new spring with the bamboo is cold, and the moon is deep through the flowers.

With the hair in my hand, I am thinking of the world, and I am drinking water to talk about my heart. I do not realize that the starry river is turning, and the branches of the mountain are frightened by the dawn birds.

title: Inscribing the Mountain Dwelling of Master Wen
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Who knows that beyond the white clouds there is another spring of green roses? The moss is around the stream, and the flowers are deep in the cave.
My wife watches the planting of herbs, my son accompanies me. Why did the one who escaped from the yao on the mountain so cultivate the truth?

title: Titled Chen Jibi
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Why does the Ying man suffer so much from the tune of drinking water? The fire and the smoke are not in the daytime, but the artemisia is deep in spring.
There are few trees in the front garden, and new birds are heard in the neighbourhood. Although there is an imperial edict to recruit the wise, it still hurts my heart not to meet them.

title: A gift to his neighbour Qi Liu Shi Cang
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The world is lost to us all. I have come to realize that under the Heng Gate, hastiness is the time of the ages.
The sound of roosters in the neighbouring lane, the shadow of candles across the thatch. The sound of chickens in the neighbouring lane and the shadow of candles in the thatched cottage.

title: Sending the Geese on a Journey
author: 錢起
paragraphs: In autumn, the sky is clear for ten thousand miles. The wind is rushing and the frost is cold, the clouds are opening and the moon is frightened.
The long, long, long wind is not afraid to leave its wings. I look forward to the distant sky, and my nostalgia is all over the place.

title: A feast in the room of Zhang Daoshi of Yulin Guan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The world of the living is extinguished, and the love of the imagination is forgotten. The autumn moon is cold at the bamboo altar, and the night bell is clear at the mountain temple.
The immortal couple gathered in the clouds, and the cups of the sun reached the dawn. The same joy can never be repeated, the red dragon welcomes us at dawn.

title: An Autumn Evening Banquet with Liang Feiwen
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A guest arrives at Hengmen, when the forest is fragrant with crocodile grass. A good breeze can come by itself, and a bright moon need not be expected.
The shadows of the lotus in autumn, the crisp willow branches in clear light. It is late for the dawn bell.

title: Weeping for Supreme Master Xuan of the Empty Silence Temple
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Under the two poignant trees, we are in tears in a distant public house. The lamp is renewed, the furnace adds incense.
The shady staircase is bright with snow, and the cold bamboo rings in the empty corridor. Silence should be a joy, but the heart of dust is sad.

title: The Temple of the Essence
author: 錢起
paragraphs: It is not easy to come across a beautiful scene. The room occupies the mountain, and the sound of the spring is heard everywhere.
Poetic thoughts are found among the bamboo, and the heart of the Tao is born under the pine. When will you come to this place to get rid of your worldly love?

title: An Encounter with Zhang Gui at Kaiyuanguan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The place where I forget to return is the place where I never tire of meeting. The coolness of the evening is in the jade well, and the new summer is in the pines.
I want to get drunk and drink in the sunset, but I still want to wake up and drink at the bamboo bell. I pity the distant peaks that can be seen under the ki trees.

title: 和人秋归終南山別業
author: 錢起
paragraphs: After three visits to my old residence, I have been searching for a new place in the evening. The wild path reaches the end of the door, and the mountain window is shaded by bamboo.
In the old days, the onions came out of the valley; today, the phoenixes return to the forest. Who can succeed this heart?

title: Elegy for the late Lord Miao of Xiangguo
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Who was buried at the Ba tomb? The Lord of Han remembered Xiao He. A great career is left in history, but the floating glory is lost in the waves.
The clouds are still raining, and the dew has become a song. In the miserable Pingjin pavilion, the autumn breeze is hanging over the visitors.

title: Rewarding Liu Renwai for his advice in the Rain
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The bitter rain is dripping from the orchids, and the autumn breeze is producing kudzu. Three paths are deserted, and four neighbours are scarce.
I am with the leopard, not for the swallow. I am ashamed to say that you have folded your scarf, but I am still willing to ask for a place in Heng Shi.

title: Fu De Gui Yun Sends Li Shanren Back to Mount Hua
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The beautiful scenery is a thousand miles long, and the returning clouds have accumulated several piles. I would like to follow the Mao Mui's mountain, and at first roll up the Aunt Shao's peak.
The shadow of the lid follows the horses, the fragrance of the clothes brushes the crouching dragon. It is only on the valley that the true air is melting.

title: A Visit to the New Pavilion of Pei Changguan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The thatched cottage has many new ideas; the fragrant forest was moved yesterday. The wild man knows the stone path, and the birds recognize the flowering branches.
Slow water lingers in the canopy, and the leisurely clouds hang in the bamboo hedge. When I get home, I get drunk, but I can't ride my horse back.

title: A Letter to the Ambassador Lang Shiyuan of Yingzhou
author: 錢起
paragraphs: At the Dragon Festival, we know there is nothing to do, and the river city does not hide its door. The poems are far away, the books are rare.
Sitting in the tsunami watching the tide rise, walking in spring sending the geese home. I am looking forward to three or five nights, thinking of Xuanhui.

title: A Tea Party with Long Shangren at Chang Sun's Residence
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I was with a resting partner and forgot to return to the home of a talented man. We are talking and thinking, and drinking green tea instead of durian flowers.
Watching the clouds roll in the water on the shore, and letting the scenery slant with the hair. If Pine Qiao had met here, he would not have been drunk with the sunset.

title: 下第題長安客舍
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I do not want to see the green clouds, I am sad to see the yellow birds fly. The pear blossoms are in the midst of a cold eclipse, and the guests are not yet dressed for spring.
Things in the world can change at any time, and my friendship is not the same as mine. There is no master willow left, but we are still seeing each other.

title: Accompanying Wang Xianwai of Kaokong to a Banquet at the Pond Pavilion in the East of the City
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There is a pond with a forest in an unforgiving land. The crane is quiet and the feathers are sparse, and the canopy has lost all its fragrance.
I never tire of looking at the clear mountains, how long is the interest of flowing water. The sun rushes home at night, and the sound of the bell descends into the sunset.

title: A Visit to the Mountain Residence of Sun Renwai in Lantian
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I don't know if I am a guest at the incense station. The orchid in the tent will grow old, and the pheasant in the chariot will also rest.
The clouds come out of the cave at the window, and the bamboos are in the mountains at the door. In the evening, the family returned to pick ferns.

title: Autumn Garden in the Evening
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The yellow scroll is in a poor alley, and the heart of the Tao is born on my return. Under five willows, three paths deep in a small garden.
Pouring scallions into words, cold flowers do not pretend to be in the forest. I am grateful to the group of scholars, and I drink alone and sing.

title: Poor Autumn and Rain
author: 錢起
paragraphs: It is raining bitterly in the dark days, and there is no change in the mood. There is no certainty in life, and the clouds of sorrow do not open.
The door to Zhai is sad with nocturnal birds, and the ink stove is cold with moss. I have come to believe that the guards of Xuancheng are afraid of exposure to the stream.

title: Pei Di's Autumn Evening at the Moon in Nanmen
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The moon fills Xie Gong's building at night when poetry and wine are in the air. The shadows are closed and the doors are quiet, and the cold grows in the autumn of a solitary tree.
Magpies scatter with the leaves, and fireflies flow far into the smoke. At the end of this evening, the sky is far away, and the light is sad in several places.

title: 和蜀縣段明府秋城望歸期
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The river is quiet, the ducks are far away. Once the wind has smoothed the grass, and again the dew has filled the bars.
In the autumn, the autumn is even more sorrowful. The river is full of beautiful algae.

title: Returning to Lantian in the Evening: A Reward for Wang Wei's Gift
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I have always returned with the white clouds. I still miss the oranges in favour of my salary, and look at the mountains without picking violets.
The birds go before the horses at night, the new moon is waiting to open its door. When I look back at the sky, I know my soulmate in the green and trivial.

title: The Book of the Emperor Hua's Royal Highness, Hearing of his Illness in Bazhong
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Letters of love have come and gone, and our hearts are far closer. The trees beyond the clouds are not separated from the people in our eyes.
Dreaming of the colours of the flowering sack, thinking of the yellow birds in spring. I have heard of the sickness of the official, and I have heard of a new night of hair.

title: 宿新里館
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A sad man is waiting for the dawn rooster, and the autumn rain is dark and miserable. The candle and the firefly are dying, and the geese are getting low.
The visitor comes to know that his plans have been misplaced, and weeps in his dreams. There is no way to escape from the sadness, and the cold baleen cries everywhere.

title: Gukou Shuzhai to Yang Jianqu
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A spring and a ravine with a thatched roof, and a cloud of ficus curtains. The bamboo pities the new rain, the mountains love the sunset.
It is always early for the leisurely heron to roost, and even later for the autumn flowers to fall. The boy sweeping the path of the radish was with the old man yesterday.

title: Spring Night at Hengmen
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am not tired of the breeze beneath the clear forest. I would rather have the moon in the north window, and call myself a man of the upper emperor.
I would like to say that the butterflies of Zhuang and the old man are as innocent as you are.

title: Title: Master of Wu Tongwei
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There is no end to the days of poverty, and I wish for a few hours of harmony. Who knows the aspirant's mind when it is late in autumn?
In the morning, the smoke does not rise from the stove, and the cold leaves are about to grow. I am still left to drink the water, and the lonely lamp lights up the night studio.

title: The Late Lodging in the Preliminary Hall
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The heart of my hometown cannot be questioned, and the autumn air meets me again. I have been wandering for thousands of miles, but I have been sadly separated for many times.
The returning clouds follow the departing geese, the cold dew drips from the cricket. At the end of the day, I can hear the bell of my homeland.

title: The Maozhi Period on the Blue with Wang Wei as a Complement
author: 錢起
paragraphs: In the mountains, no one is seen, the clouds are gone and the sun is setting. There are few fish in the shallow mosses, and many butterflies in the orchids in autumn.
In my old age, I am not concerned with worldly affairs, but I am happy with the harmony of heaven. When the wine is ripe, I think of a talented man, and I look at Yoke at the stream.

title: The Spring Night Fable
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am accustomed to the clouds, and I am like a bird. I do not know how high the pavilion is, but I feel that the jade rope is low.
The tent is warm with fragrant smoke, the poem is inscribed with a pen. The spring is not yet over, and the dream is over.

title: 新昌里言懷
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am a clumsy man who occasionally engages in eunuchism. Though I look at the grass in the north hall, I do not look at the old mountain vines.
The flowers and the moon are good when they are ripe, and the clouds and springs are good for dreaming. How can I get dressed for the morning?

title: An Autumn Evening with Yuan Zhongcheng and Wang Renwai
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A thousand thoughts in one night, and I know how hard it was for them to leave. It is difficult to meet with one another in one's old age and glory, but the dreams of the soul are temporarily shared.
The moon is early in the morning, the river is high in the sky. I should pity Jiang Sheng's path, where the autumn dew fills the moss.

title: Nine Days of Idleness in a Letter to the Sons of Denggao
author: 錢起
paragraphs: At the beginning of my life, I was perched in a poor alley. I spent the day at the door to thank the sick, and my heart was drunk with the autumn clothes.
The wine is over, the flowers laugh, the garden is empty, the birds are sad. Today, there are a few places where the hats are down and the strings are left.

title: Late Entering the Xuancheng Border
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The slanting sun is shaded by a sail, and the spring breeze is a lonely visitor's heart. The mountain comes to point out the woodcutter's path, the shore goes to cherish the forest of flowers.
The sea is steaming with dark clouds, the tide is deep with rain. I can't tell you how sad I am about my hometown, but I listen to the ape's song at the end of the river.

title: A Silent Night in Honor of Supreme Master Tong's Illness
author: 錢起
paragraphs: It is cool in the morning in the eastern forest, and I am resting on a high pillow in a distant public room. After the Great Master has seen the heart, the midnight clearing is long.
The cicada emerges from the dark willow, the moon is hidden in the corridor. What is it that has taken so long for me to sink into my diarrhoea that I asked the King of Medicine for my hair.

title: Accompanying the Ambassador's Fourteenth Uncle to the Great Cloud Gate Temple at Night
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Outside a thousand temples, a leisurely walk passes by in the evening. The heat of the day is over the water, and the sun is shining on the forest.
The world is a deluded place, the people are at peace with the government. The bed of ropes shakes the stag's tail, and the waves are full of good fun.

title: A reward for the advice of the Taoist priest Song Yang Jiao at the end of spring in the province
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The flowers fly all night in the forest, and the wine hurts my heart in spring. The years are pushing my hair out of my face, and I do not realize that I am wearing a hairpin.
When I am old, I meet my soulmate. How can I be a guest of the purple chi, remembering the deep white clouds?

title: Rewarding Miao Fa for his stay at Longji Temple
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I would rather know that I am waiting for a visitor, but I am at ease on a clear night. I leave the pheasant in the chariot, and follow the dragon that protects the Dharma.
The smoke is light on the moon, and the bell is heard quietly in the forest. The Ying Song transmits the sweet dew, and the dusty heart is cleansed.

title: Elegy for Empress Zhen Yi
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A beautiful poem by a lady, and a mournful decoration by a badge. There is no day to worship the heir apparent.
The moon is alone in the autumn palace, and the mountains are out on the night terrace. The green bird flies alone.

title: The Return to the Old Mountain at the Beginning of the Year
author: 錢起
paragraphs: To know the goodness of the valley of foolishness, the long separation and the return of spring. The warbler returns to the trees at the beginning, while the clouds love the mountains.
The rocky fields are little cultivated, and the wild guest is a casual person. It should be difficult to see the wandering sun, but the sun is still covering the gate.

title: A Farewell to Han Yunqing at the Age of the Defiant
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am sad to see the country move on as I die with white hair and a strong heart. The mountains and the hills are in a dreadful state, and the love of my family is suddenly frightened away.
The shadows of the dragon part the sword, the sound of the bird laments the branch. Beyond the clouds, we remember each other but do not know each other.

title: Winging the White Oil Hat to Send Off a Guest
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The thinness of my body is a shame, and the sadness of the shade is a blessing. There is no definite day for the winding and the shifting, but the action must follow the person.
I have been blessed with the benefits of the cream, and I have resigned from the rain and dew. Though of the same colour as the guest's garment, it does not stain the dust of Luoyang.

title: The Stone Mustard Cultivated on the Blue and Sent to the Former Li Mingfu
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Where Yuanming left his love, the mountain mustard was green and fragrant at the beginning. Playing with the colours of this spring shade, it still nourishes the night rain.
The leaves of smoke across the stream are small, the snow blossoms on the rocks are soft. The leaves are small, and the rocks are covered with snow.

title: Sending the Master of the Orphans to Shangdu
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Near and far, the king's city is on the edge of the sun. The king welcomes the speaker, and the child accompanies him.
When I arrive, flowers become rain; when I walk, a staff emerges from a spring. Tonight, under the pine moon, the door is closed and I wish to meditate in peace.

title: Sending Shen Shaofu back to Jiangning
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A faraway eunuch is outside the blue clouds, and this trip is a great pleasure. The lake and the mountain are in the well, and the gull and the bird are near the gods.
The slanting sun backs the trees in my hometown, and the spring tide welcomes the passenger boat. A new song from the river house should be transmitted with the political voice.

title: Sending Yu Xie Mewdi on a Journey to the East
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The lake and the mountains are unbearable, and there is still love in looking east. After the piece of jade has been enrolled in the imperial examinations, the lone boat can travel at will.
In the midst of the moon, Yan Zi Zie, in the midst of the flowers, in the city of the king of Chu. A crane in the clouds at the end of the year is heard singing once more in the sky.

title: Sending Master Shaowei on his Journey to the West
author: 錢起
paragraphs: With the edge of the world, he suddenly left for the west, when will he return to the East Forest. The world would rather part in contempt than rest in peace.
There are few people and few meals, and the mountains are deep in snow and solitude. Where the apes cry from beyond the sky, who can hear the clear sound of the Brahman.

title: Sending Sun Shaofu to Kunshan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The Emperor's love is near to the sea, and he rides the stream to see the blue sky. Who knows that the immortal official has gone, just like the dust of the world.
A distant sail carries a returning bird, and a lonely boat is on the tide. I know that the court of law is quiet, and the day is dreary in the window and bamboo.

title: Sending Qu Tu Si Ma to serve as the Bookkeeper of An Xi
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The victory of the three armies was powerful, the clarification of ten thousand miles. The star flies over the Pangtong's foot, and the arrow issues the book of Lu Lian.
The moon in the sea lowers the pennant of clouds, the sunset in the jade carriage. I know the sword of Tai'a from afar, and I plan to cut the whale on the day.

title: Sending Siam to the South of China
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Three sighs of sadness and seven griefs. The clouds and the sky are worried about the faraway farewell, and the tigers and jackals embrace the future.
Weeping from across the river as we part company. I am in love with you as if you were dreaming.

title: Sending the Imperial Couple back to the East for the Sankin Kotai
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There is a remnant of the eastward journey, and the spring breeze gives birth to clothes. The phoenix is in the imperial palace, and the talented son is picking an orchid.
In a hundred flowers of wine, a lover's smile is rare. We need not count the days of separation, but we look forward to seeing each other.

title: Sending Li Chang-shi to Hongzhou
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Holding my zither as a proud official, I repeatedly traveled south by boat. For several times the water of the river in autumn has been filled with the sound of white snow.
A dream of a guest on a good day, a dream of a king's journey. The government is at peace with itself.

title: Sending Song Zhengjun back to the mountains
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There are no traces of the Emperor's presence. The Palace of Wei is full of flowers, and the spring mountains are full of apricot fields.
The purple haze opens the wine of farewell, the yellow crane dances the strings of separation. Tonight I dream of you, and enter the cave of heaven.

title: Sending Chen to be released to Kankin province by the imperial decree
author: 錢起
paragraphs: This is how I feel today, and the light of clarity is unattainable. My heart is under the sun, and my hometown is among the clouds of Chu.
The willow is still on the boat, the hibiscus is on the old mountain. Picking orchids and wearing brocade is not like buying a minister's return.

title: Sending off his nephew Fan Mian to become Changzhou's chief historian and to visit the provinces
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I pity you for your departure. I'm still in the world of glory and wealth, and I'll be back in my hometown by day.
The orange blossoms are low in the guest's house, the Brasenas are around the returning boat. The old man who reported to me that I had stayed in the world.

title: 隴右送韋三return to the capital
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The spring breeze rises from the eastern road, shaking hands and looking at the capital. The willow colours come from the hometown, and the sound of onions sends visitors back.
The road to the capital is a short distance away. I can't see the end of my love, but I've lost my ambition.

title: Sending Yuan Jianshu back to his mountain home
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I remember my home and look at the road of clouds, and I go east alone. The water follows the fires of the fishermen, and the hills reach the bamboo.
The cold flowers make the wine ripe, and the mountain dogs are happy to see people return. Under the window of the book, a thousand peaks emerge from the greenery.

title: Sending Wujin Wei Mingfu
author: 錢起
paragraphs: When I think of nothing in Rixi, I don't play my zither in the hall. The well field leads to Chu and Yue, and the city of Jin is half fisherman.
The oranges are in the rain, the red lotus is in the frost. I send you off to your hometown, thinking of your hometown alone by the water.

title: A Letter to the Lord's Counselor
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am grateful for the light and distant way in which I entered the curtain. I am grateful for the light and distant path, and I am more at home in the curtain than at home.
Spring clouds in Jieshi, flowers in Handan's ancient trees. A letter is sent to the Lord, and the fires are quiet.

title: Sending Guo Xiucai off on a trip to the south
author: 錢起
paragraphs: When I lost my ambition and thought of wandering, I knew that you were not famous. I have been away from the customs and the dust, but I have passed through the Ying Dynasty with a clear mind.
When the mountains are full and the streams are wide, the boat is at ease. There are no thoughts of travel, and no fear of the chorus of the ape.

title: Sending Xiahou to the East
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The birds are gone in Chu, alone with the blue clouds. The broken mirror urges the returning guest to return, and the waning sun sees the old mountain.
The poem was written on the flowing water, and the dream ended in the flowers. The words of love in quite a few cases will surely make people feel sad.

title: Sending Wei Gong Cao to Jingnan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The Han family is still using martial arts, and the talented son is late in becoming famous. Who knows the love of the Wei Palace?
The blue clouds sorrow the waters of Chu, the spring wine intoxicates the city of Yi. I am sure I would like to hear the sound of a tsunami while sitting in the curtain.

title: Sending the Ambassador Ma to Zhengzhou
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The East is suddenly free of trouble, and the special city is again filled with wise men. I am glad to see the Ban Rui ceremony, and the year of the supine army.
The rains bring the waters of the river, and the returners plough the fields. On the day when we get off the train, new smoke rises from ten thousand wells.

title: Sending Lang Si to the East
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There is nothing to be done in the world together, and many a time there is nothing to be done in hiding. I look at each other and love the hairpin group, and I do not feel the old wind and dust.
A drink to pity the present farewell, and a sad heart for the past spring. In vain do I say that the daylilies have no place to comfort the separated.

title: Sending Lu San out of the Lieutenant
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The spring grass comes in the evening, and the East Gate is sad to see you off. The great talent is still in the lower position, and the Ming dynasty is full of strange writings.
I am happy with the way of the immortals, and I will always follow the herons. The plum is sent to the yellow shou, and will soon be in the green clouds.

title: Sending An Du Xiu Cai back to the North
author: 錢起
paragraphs: As a young man, he was a literary scholar. He did not retreat in contempt, but was happy to return in colourful clothes.
The new moon comes to the former pavilion, the high sun comes out of the old gate. I longed for the northeast, but Yan and Zhao were separated by green hills.

title: Sending Chu XI to Wu Kan Province
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A poet never forgets the colours of the Wu mountains. The fragrance of orange-coloured clothes.
The journey ahead is not yet sunset. Who would cherish the fragrance of Du Geng.

title: Sending Fei Xiucai back to Hengzhou
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Looking south at the Xiao Xiang islet, the lyricist remembers his home far away. The guest's heart follows the waters of Chu, and the returning boat stays with the flowers of the river.
I am not afraid of my heart being blocked, but I am worried about meeting on credit. There are wings in the clouds and sky, and there are yoyos in every inch.

title: Sending Lu Langzhong
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I am still in love with my lord. A farewell with fragrance on the powdered pen, a polarized door with a brush.
The sound of the onions is out of the Han court, the colour of the willows is across the Zhang River. It is hard to end our love for each other.

title: Sending the Monk Back to Japan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The upper country dwells as it pleases; the way to come is like a dream walk. The sea is far away, but the boat is light.
The water and the moon are connected to the view of Zen, the fish and the dragon hear the sound of Sanskrit. The shadow of a single lamp shines brightly in the eyes of ten thousand miles.

title: Sending Yang Ha Moudi to Jiangnan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A new song and a new sorrow as the pedestrians go by the water. The moon is high in autumn, and the mountain is far away.
Hanging sails on the Yanzi Settlement, sprinkling wine at the Jingting Temple. How can I send my thoughts when there are no more poems at the end of the year?

title: Sending Tian Cang Cao back to the Kotai
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The green threads of the rallying horse and the green silk of the ponies are on their way to the capital to look at Liangcheng. In the autumn, we are reminded of the oranges.
It is late in the evening when the banquet is cold, and the road back is full of blue clouds. The night of a thousand miles of longing for each other, sorrowful at the bright moon.

title: Sending Zhang Guan Shuji
author: 錢起
paragraphs: There is much labour at the border, and the Confucian clothes are carried on the drums. The sun is cold beyond the trees, and the peaks are full of clouds in the west.
The river is too wide to cross, the sky is too distant for geese. The son of Ban Chao, who had been appointed by Ding Yuan, went to Si Qi.

title: Sending the Permanent Secretary Xiao to the North
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The Jiang Jiang Festival leads to the carved gorse, the singing of the fox moves the jade ko. The city of Rong is far away, but the Han ambassadors come in many years.
The geese often stay in the snow, the sand flies halfway across the river. The bright light of the day is the day when a lone-standing tree becomes a song.

title: Sending Li Qitong to return to his hometown to serve
author: 錢起
paragraphs: In a few years, I had to pass through the gates of sagacity. The name and the pearl are out, and the countryside is suitable for returning by day.
The lotus boat is in the river, the willow bank is on the mountain. I would like to see my parents' filial piety, and my children in Confucian clothes.

title: Sending Liu Daoist
author: 錢起
paragraphs: When you die, you can become a Taoist. The crane is a thousand years old when it returns, and the carriage is five clouds long.
Spring should be over on the sea; the sun is still shining in the bottle. I don't know where we remember each other, but how many flowers are in the ki tree.

title: Sending Sceptre to Xinluo
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A man of my hometown, a man of great talent, who was clothed in the clothes of Zhou Zhushi. He was ordered to resign from the clouds and send off his envoys.
The journey to the sea has been a long one. I feel that the Confucian style is far away, and the rituals and music are new in different places.

title: Repeatedly Sending the Imperial Envoy of Lu to Japan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Three thousand miles of Korea, the pedestrians are full of sorrow. The stars are far away, and the frosty autumn is on the waterfront.
Clouds greet the island of immortals; rainbow flags pass through the mirage. I know for sure that I miss the Palace of Wei and look back at the western end of the sea.

title: Sending Lu to return to Suzhou
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Why did I return to my hometown so early? I miss my family's oranges, and the sails are light with rain.
The fire at night is at the Jin court, the bell in the morning is at the Pu city. The fires of the night are in the Jin post, the bells of the morning are in the Pu city.

title: Sending Yu Xie Moudi to the South to Kankin
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The southern breeze raises my parting arms, and my heart goes to Hengxiang. The guest is far away from the mountains of Chu, and the lonely boat is free of clouds and water.
I love the place where you pick lotus, the island of flowers and the mountains of your home. I am happy with the idea, but it is hard to return to this life.

title: Sending Lord Yuan on a Journey to the South
author: 錢起
paragraphs: With the intention of going on a long journey, I am light on two wings. It is not long before we part from our homeland, but the spring grass is not sad.
The spring is warm, the incense is clearer. When will I accompany my teacher?

title: Sending Wan Bing Cao to Guangling
author: 錢起
paragraphs: On the autumn day, I was thinking of returning to my guest, and I was talking about parting from the river. The city of Chu is about to sit in a tsunami, and the song of Ying has a residual sorrow.
The mountains are old with laurel blossoms, the rivers are cold with apple leaves. I should have recited the words of Changqing when I was in the mood for Yang.

title: Sending Judge Li to the Guizhou Curtain
author: 錢起
paragraphs: To know the value of Confucianism, I had to meet with all the lords. And, feeling the promise of a thousand gold pieces, I resigned from a journey of ten thousand miles.
The mountain of the wild goose is far away from the miasma, and the water of the laurel flows out of the clouds. It is late to leave my home, and I miss the green cypress in autumn.

title: Titled Su Gong Lin Ting
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The East Pavilion of Pingjin is still there, and the bamboo forest is still there. In the autumnal sound of ten thousand leaves, when the sun is shining on a thousand houses.
The door follows the quiet of a deep alley, and the window is late for the distant bell. Where the moss grows, the guest still writes poems.

title: A gift to send Xun Zi to the capital with cold clouds in light colours
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Infinite cold clouds, pale and shallow. If there is a dragon, the sun will not become a shadow.
All the greenery is low, and half of the forest is clear. The emperor's homeland is in sight, and the iron horses are in full swing.

title: A gift to send Liang to the capital after the dawn of the orchid
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The dawn is full of fragrance. The orchids were born in the day after the rainy day, and the flowers came in the night.
Not in the three peaks, but in a county. I know that in the big garden, I should wait for the five flowered rushes.

title: 賦得餘冰
author: 錢起
paragraphs: On the remaining ice at dawn, the spring pond is a mirror of light. It's a clear and refreshing drink.
The light of the snow is still there, but the wind is not there. If you go with the oars, you can still help your chastity.

title: The Empowerment of the Emperor to Look at the Slanting Moon at Pukou and Send Off the Judge Huangfu
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I rise to see the moon in the west tower, slanting towards the river. The moon is shaking the shallow waves, and the light is shining on the cold sand.
The water is still suspicious of snow, and the plum forest is indistinguishable from the flowers. There is nothing to give you as a gift, so I will hold this in place of the yoyo.

title: A poem about sending Judge Cen into the mountains after a long journey
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A lone boat with a star beyond the smoky haze. In the midst of the fun, I seek the white snow, and in my dreams I pass through the sea.
The night moon is in the garrison of Songjiang River, and the autumn breeze is in the pavilion of Bamboo Dock. I do not know how far I have travelled, but the grass is green.

title: Jiangning on a Spring Evening at the Seats of Envoy Pei to Send off Xiaoyuanwai
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The day is sparse in the flower garden, and the clouds roll in and out of the river. The master, Xiong Shi, was a guest in a carriage to the pheasant gate.
The dawn moon is thin and starry, and the spring smoke is left over from the Forbidden City. When I look at the stone garrison, I remember that it is Nanxu.

title: A Journey to Xue's Eight Operating Houses
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The eastern waters are going to be a lonely visitor, and the road to the south is several thousand. The rainbow is tossed on the tide, and the birds are falling in the pandemonium.
It is better to leave one's hatred behind than to wait for years to return. Let us drink a cup of wine and weep no tears of farewell.

title: Sending a Guest to Hengyang
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The returning guest loves the singing hammer, and recalls his old hometown on his southern journey. The rivers and mountains follow Song Yu, and the clouds and rain recall the King.
The city of Yi is near in the drunkenness, and the road to Ying is long in song. I pity you who have gone from here and look at Sanxiang day and night.

title: Sending a member of the imperial staff to the court
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Farewell thoughts are in turmoil, and the evil atmosphere has not yet been cleared. I have been a guest for five nights, and I have been a brother for ten years.
The frost brushes the golden wave trees, the stars return to the city of jade struggles. The crane on the river is envious of its flight.

title: Sending Li Kedian back to Bauhinia
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The boat is not tied to the same boat, and the grass is forgotten. The forbidden place was once a common place, and the river city was once a vassal.
The sails are still at the mouth of summer, and the spring rain is dreaming of Jingzhou. When will I go to the cloudy hills and follow you to worship the tassels?

title: Sending Yuan Zhongzheng to Jianghuai for Transit
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The tax was paid to the Heavenly Government, and the corvée was lightly imposed on the ambassadors. The old man is happy to have been given money, and the people are benefited.
I have been asking about the customs of different officials, but I have been here for several years. On the southeastern royal pavilion, there is no question of the wind and dust.

title: Sending Tang Beiji to Yingzhou
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The young man is engaged in a good life. The poets in the audience are excited to follow you on your way to Ying.
The reeds invade the post office trees, the clouds and water embrace the mountain city. I love the day when I get off the train and the grass grows in spring.

title: Sending Zheng Ju back to the Kotai after his graduation
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The talented Bai Hua Zi was first famous for his laurel branch. He sent his guest home in the autumn with rain.
The magpie comes near to welcome the departing man on his back. It is difficult to give a farewell gift, but in old age I fear the future.

title: 宿遠上人蘭若
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The fragrant flowers close a forest, and the true scholar looks at his heart here. The white clouds are close to the path, and the lantern is deep in the emerald wall.
The moon is clear from the Buddhist feast, and the Zen sit in the shade of a cold mountain. I would like to say that the East Stream is good, and I will seek it tomorrow.

title: Rewarding Yuan's secretary for his evening visit to Blue Brook
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The wilderness attracts the talented, and it is late to walk alone along the secluded path. Where the clouds leave the mountain, when the birds quietly emerge from the stream.
I have never forgotten to hide, and I am always here on my return. If I were to visit a friend, I would cook millet and sweep the thatch.

title: 別張起居
author: 錢起
paragraphs: When there is a parting, there is still a hatred, and the soul is lost today. The wind and waves are beginning to lift the sea, and the sorry herons are each resigning from the forest.
The old country is closed, the grass and dew are deep in the new autumn. The old country is closed, the new autumn is deep in grass and dew.

title: Guo Situ's Night Banquet
author: 錢起
paragraphs: In the autumn hall, the night is always dark, and the eyes are all sad. The frosty battlements are bitter with the sound of birds, and the moon is chilly in the evening.
The beauty of the evening is deep in parting, and the wine is seldom left for pleasure. What will be the gift of a bright hair?
The two jade plates of my life.

title: First Arrival at Peking and Showing the Disciples
author: 錢起
paragraphs: After returning home from a hundred battles, how many of my old friends have survived. When brothers meet, there is no place to discuss their glory.
New poems are added to the scrolls, and old work is seen by the children and grandchildren. I can't get out of the thistle without checking my life's events.

title: Washing Medicine under the Moon
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The well is drawn towards the new moon, and it flows into the many fragrances. The wet flowers are low in the shadow of the laurel, and the leaves are quiet in the light of the spring.
The dew adds to the lushness of the dew, and the bee attracts a secret fragrance. I send a message to those who wish to nurture their health, and come here to carry the basket together.

title: Sitting Alone in the Garden of Yongning Villa in Late Spring, Addressed to Wang Xianggong
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The east pavilion is quiet, and the sound of the onions is sad at sunset. I am temporarily bidding farewell to Kui Long, and I am thinking of autumn at dusk.
The crocus grass is outside the hedge, the flowering branches are sent to the bamboo. The upper part of the house is full of grace, and the eve of the seventh day is a time of grace.

title: A poem on the thatch at the end of the year
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A fugitive from fame at the mouth of the valley has returned to his ambition. The thin fields are for old wine, the trees are for new birds.

The spring clouds are heavy on the stream road, and the night fires are deep in the mountain kitchen. The peach garden should be getting better and better, and the immortal guests may seek each other.

title: Ascent of Mount Yu on the Ninth Day
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Who knows the scenery on the mountain? Long Sha is a tale of the past, and the chrysanthemum wine is for this autumn.
A rocky walk rises with the clouds, and a poem is composed to the stream of water. There is a place where I forget to return, where the clouds under the pines are secluded.

title: A banquet for Cui Jinma on Yushan
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The golden list is a trivial one, the luxury is half hidden. The jade xiao only sends wine, and the robe sleeves love to keep guests.
The smoke in the bamboo pavilion is a reminder of the night; the snow in the plum garden is a mistake for spring. A full house is full of resigned guests, all of whom have entered the forest.

title: Spring Valley, a secluded residence
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The yellow birds are singing in the garden, the new sun is changing the old shade. This is a beautiful spring scene, just like the heart of Lord Xie.
The orchid buds emerge from the sweeping path, and the shadows of the mountains are deep in the pond. The vaunted name follows the heron, and it is not long before the forest is inhabited.

title: The Two Lilac Trees on the Pond
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The lilacs are far away from their roots, and their fingers are tender. The fragrance of the dew is thick with laurel, and the shadow of the pond is a curl.
The leaves are light and green, and the flowers smile at the chrysanthemum in autumn. The rain and the dew are not far from the South China Sea.

title: Titled Fanchuan Du Xianggong Bieye
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A few mu of garden is good, and people know the house of a wise minister. A few acres of garden are good, and people know the house of a wise minister.
Old trees grow in spring, new lotus rolls with fallen flowers. The sacred grace is added to the jade, and one can rest on the green haze.

title: Rewarding Lu XI for Passing Over the Night
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I have not yet tried to return to my home, and I look at the clouds and the forest day and night. I am still looking at the clouds and the forest, and when I meet the green grass, why should I ask this heart?
With my official duties behind closed doors, I have no time for my old love. I will stay in another country at night and sing with you at Liang Fu.

title: Greetings from the Fourteenth House of Cui
author: 錢起
paragraphs: In the dawn, the onions cry, and the traveler's thoughts are lost in the river city. I am not sure if I can be bothered to take you with me.
In the distant waters of the river, the battlements of the green hills lie to the west. The king's grandson should not lie down for long, for the spring grass is lush.

title: A poem written after seeing plum blossoms on a mountain road
author: 錢起
paragraphs: I don't want to say that the mountain road is remote, but I am still urged by the good wind. The traveler passes by in the cold, and the village hedge is open.
The cold waters of the evening stream shine, and several bees come on the sunny day. I remember the wine of Jiangnan again.

title: Winging the Pine on the Gate, on the Three Sangha Members of Yuan, Wang and Du
author: 錢起
paragraphs: In the past, I heard that the grass was born at the bottom of the stream, but now I see it rise. The grass is gone at this time, who knows the coldness of the year.
How can a building be built and how can I leave the door? It is not difficult to overwhelm the clouds with the brush.

title: 早發東陽
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The breeze is urging visitors to the plum blossom bridge. A few geese rise from the foreshore, and a thousand ships compete for the tide.
I will go with the floating clouds, and I regret that the old mountains are far away. I am sad to see the end of the waves of smoke, but the date is in the blue sky.

title: A Message from the Boat to Li Qiju
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The landscape is beautiful on a southward journey. The trees in Ying in spring, the mountains on the lake in clear sunshine.
The sails of my home are far away, and I am looking back at the evening tide. What is the gift of the celandine grass?

title: The Night Rain Sent Kou to School
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The autumn pavilion is closed by smoke and rain, and the bell in the heavy city is deep. The night of the good time is blocked, and the loneliness of the lonely heart.

The shadows of the candles are out of the cloth curtain, and the sound of insects is linked to the music of the qin. At this time, friends in the pavilion should remember that they used to share a bed.

title: 喜喜李侍御拜郎官入省
author: 錢起
paragraphs: A flowered rickshaw enters the pink office, and the purple Letters Patent drape the sky. The straight house was surprised by the approaching leak, and the gift was moved by the frost.
The Lord of Han was in front of the scallops, the Marquis of Rang was in front of the pond. He should pity the geese that come after him and envy the branches of the upper forest.

title: Su Duan Lin Ting (Su Duan Lin Ting) in the Pleasant Rain with Wine
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The drizzle is flying over the forest, and the coolness of the night is drifting in. I know where to leave my guests, but I have passed by with a good wind.
Mauve and red pistil, jumping pearls and stirring blue lotus. The beauty of the landscape is so deep that it can be sung.

title: Seeing the Spring Geese Flying in the Green Clouds in the Upper Forest, addressed to Yang Qiju and Li Renwai
author: 錢起
paragraphs: Spring is better in the upper forest, and the geese do not know when to return. The shadows are pitying the green cabins, and the sounds are entering the purple.
At night they stay with the herons in the pond, and in the morning they fly out of the garden. I would rather remember my partner in the cold countryside, and the phoenixes are rare.

title: Even Cheng
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The moon is a beautiful moonlight on the curtain. The door is quiet, the officials are at rest, and the mind is empty.
The stars are in the sparse trees, the magpies are tired of the autumn wind. I feel that the night sleeps in the public.

title: Fishpond Worth the Rain
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The sun enters the forest and the island; the crane sings in the wind and the grass. The lonely sail is moored on a wasted islet, and the flying rain comes to the mountain in front.
The visitor's thoughts are on staying, and the river journey is suddenly obstructed. The pavilion is still a few miles away, and the night is waiting for the return of the peaceful stream.

title: Titled Xiao Cheng Xiao Chi
author: 錢起
paragraphs: The onions are singing and the grass is green. Where the woods forget their words, when the Mandarin is nurturing his quills.
The spring springs warm the herbs, the sunny days are late for flowers. This meeting is a drunken one, but it is difficult to recapture the moment.
